item.title: How to create a json object in a SQL query
item.description: It’s possible to create JSON objects from a table in SQL. For example, given a table with columns colA, colB, colC if I wanted to create a new table with columns id and json_object where the values in the json_object column were {'mycolA': value_from_colA, 'mycolB': value_from_colB} the appropriate SQL query would be

item.title: Cannot un-fork in github
item.description: Although you cannot “un-fork” a GitHub repository, you can do so by cloning what you’ve got into a new repository then deleting the original. This way, you’ve also removed the fork relationship.

item.title: How to create a github page
item.description: Making github pages is incredibly easy
